Sentencas: A straightforward method for accelerated testing of Cr poisoning phenomena on mixed ionic and electronic conducting (MIEC) Solid Oxide Cell (SOC) air electrode materials was developed.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes

Sentencas: Cr2O3-powder is mixed with an organic matrix and screen printed onto anode-supported button cells with (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-delta (LSCF) cathode.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes

Sentencas: Then, a thermal treatment was conducted to achieve the formation of a well-defined amount of SrCrO4 on the cathode surface within only a few hours.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes

Sentencas: For the proof of concept, single cell measurements were done to investigate the influence of this new kind of Cr deposition.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes

Sentencas: As reference, a cell poisoned via gas phase diffusion and a cell without any Cr contamination were characterized in the same manner.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes

Sentencas: According to the impedance data, the polarization resistance for both cells, which were contaminated with Cr species, increased.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes

Sentencas: The expected relationship between deposited amount of Cr and increase of polarization resistance was found.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes

Sentencas: ICP-OES analysis proves the high reproducibility of the method as the Cr content is only a function of the Cr paste composition and almost independent of external poisoning conditions.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes

Sentencas: Due to its scalability and reproducibility, this method is proposed to be a new tool for screening of cathode materials and the investigation of different stages of Cr poisoning prior to more sophisticated and time consuming investigations like stack tests.
Titulo: Accelerated Testing of Chromium Poisoning of Sr-Containing Mixed Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Air Electrodes
